scripts.dev: cross-env USE_PRODUCTION_DB=TRUE HIJACKED_USER=79237403620945920 concurrently --kill-others "nodemon index.js" "cd frontend-react && npm start"
scripts.dev:notprod: cross-env HIJACKED_USER=79237403620945920 concurrently --kill-others "nodemon index.js" "cd frontend-react && npm start"
scripts.build: cd frontend-react && npm install && npm run build && mv build ../build
scripts.testbuild: rmdir /s /q build && cd frontend-react && npm run build && move build ../build
